title: What Spatial Audio Can and Cannot Do for Classical Music
description: Immersive audio formats, while newer for pop, have been used by composers for decades. But not all works call for spatial treatment.

title: Sliman Bensmaia, Who Enabled Prosthetic Limbs to Feel, Dies at 49
description: His work in the neuroscience of touch led to devices that allow amputees and quadriplegics not just to move about the world but also to sense temperature and pressure.
